binaryMove.title: Dyad
binaryMove.description: Move two pieces in one move, you cannot capture a piece but you can check.

fugitive.title: Fugitive
fugitive.description: Castle out of or through check.

shift.title: Pawn Shift
shift.description: Move a Pawn 1 space left or right.

bishopToggle.title: Bishop Toggle
bishopToggle.description: Move one of your bishops onto one of the four adjacent squares on the opposite color complex, capturing not allowed.

rookToggle.title: Rook Toggle
rookToggle.description: Move your Rook diagonally one square, no captures.

spectreSummon.title: Spectre Summon
spectreSummon.description: Place a Spectre on the board.

sacSummonMin.title: Sacrifice Summon Minor
sacSummonMin.description: Sacrifice your Queen for 3 Minor pieces to summon of your choice on your half of the board.

sacSummonMaj.title: Sacrifice Summon Major
sacSummonMaj.description: Sacrifice your Queen for 2 Rooks to summon on your half of the board.

sacDeploy.title: Sacrifice Deployment
sacDeploy.description: Capture any friendly piece, not a King.

exile.title: Exile
exile.description: Choose an empty square, no pieces can land or pass through this square for the remainder of the game.

royalty.title: Royalty
royalty.description: Choose a square, any piece on this square can move like a Queen only when occupying the square.

swapAttack.title: Swap Attack
swapAttack.description: Your N/B/R trades spots with a hostile N/B/R

swapDeploy.title: Swap Deployment
swapDeploy.description: Your N/B/R trades spots with a friendly N/B/R.

swapAdjacent.title: Swap Adjacent
swapAdjacent.description: Trade spots of two adjacent pieces, friendly or hostile, no Kings.

futureSight.title: Future Sight
futureSight.description: Move back two turns at your discretion.

randomize.title: Randomize
randomize.description: Your opponents pieces are randomized into a Chess 960 position.

inheritance.title: Inheritance
inheritance.description: Your pawns are now promoted on the 2nd or 7th rank.

invisibility.title: Invisiblity
invisibility.description: Your opponent cannot see your pieces for 2 turns.

swapATK.name: Adversary Translocate
swapATK.description: Swap the positions of a friendly and enemy Rook, Bishop, or Knight.

modsRAN.name: War Dice
modsRAN.description: Randomize your opponent's back rank to a 960 position.

modsPRE.name: Premonition Implant
modsPRE.description: See all of your opponent's premoves or bets.

swapADJ.name: Proximity Translocate
swapADJ.description: Swap the positions of any orthogonally adjacent pieces, no Pawn promotions.
